summary:
ENB v0.119 for Skyrim (works fine with ENB V0.123 too)
This is a tweaked and adapted ENB of Midras\' Fallout 3 ENB.
Colourful and vibrant with deep shadows.
Small performance hit with AO and DOF off.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://tof.canardpc.com/view/260078b1-eae5-40fe-9837-401bf78d7c07.jpg[/img][/center]

[img]http://tof.canardpc.com/view/afe9faa0-d654-447f-83d2-302af6e1d672.jpg[/img]

[center]ENB adapted from [url=http://fallout3.nexusmods.com/mods/18107]Fallout 3 ENB by Midhras [/url]for Skyrim\'s ENB v0.119 (works fine with ENB V0.123 too)[/center]

[b][center]I won\'t work on this ENB anymore, see my newest ENB[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27872] Breeze Of The Nords.[/url][/center][/b]

- Colourful and vibrant ENB.
- Deep shadows
- Blue sky with scenic sunsets and sunrises
- Dark blueish nordic night
- Dark caves and interiors
- Performance friendly in its preset with Ambient Occlusion and Depth of Field OFF (recommended preset)
- Blueish distant fog during day time to hide the ugly LOD and give a sensation of distance.

[center]Not compatible with Climates of Tamriel and URWL.[/center]

[center][img]http://tof.canardpc.com/view/8b729c18-3b6b-491e-ad57-471fa2d26172.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://tof.canardpc.com/view/ede21966-06e7-4405-8e8c-90d2e27bf8e3.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://tof.canardpc.com/view/5b0ed085-810f-4e42-a699-0756aa696454.jpg[/img][/center]

[img]http://tof.canardpc.com/view/9025da0b-2b92-40d9-b698-7846c796d0e7.jpg[/img]

V1.4a
- Minor interior light tweaks (less white and bright)

V1.4
- Reworked skies (night and day), volumetric fog, darker nights (but still a little bit blue), and other minor tweaks.

V1.3b 
- Some specular tweaks

V1.3a
- Bluer sky

V1.3
Reworked the ENB (it\'s the weekend, eh) :
- More vivid colors
- Deeper shadows
- Better sky

V1.2
- Clouds during day are less bright
- Depth of Field fixed, more presets to choose (AO off or on, DOF off or on).

V1.1
- Darker nights ! 
- Clouds are less white during nights.
- Now Ambient Occlusion is ON by default, a preset with AO OFF is included.

V 1.00
- Initial Realease

[center][img]http://tof.canardpc.com/view/4d25aeae-b2c6-4515-8f57-16aa3bf24126.jpg[/img][/center]

[img]http://tof.canardpc.com/view/3414ee9b-11e1-48a0-a945-24c328e389ef.jpg[/img]

Working on a compatibility preset with Climates of Tamriel. But I can\'t promise anything.

I am open to suggestions.

[center][img]http://tof.canardpc.com/view/093e1d2b-bbba-4cf5-8382-b821c80148fb.jpg[/img][/center]

[img]http://tof.canardpc.com/view/de35814a-cb73-4128-b29b-9ca2c8333781.jpg[/img]

 [youtube]m50Gbt7eHIw[/youtube]

[img]http://tof.canardpc.com/view/eac2e7d6-0797-40e2-9148-88a4293c962a.jpg[/img]

- Download, extract and copy the ENB v0.119  (or ENB v0.123) files in your Skyrim folder, use wrapper version.
- Do not forget to change bFloatPointRenderTarget=1, bTreesReceiveShadows=1 and bShadowsOnGrass=1 in your Skyrimprefs.ini
- Download, extract and copy this ENB files in your Skyrim folder. Overwrite when asked.

Nvidia users, I highly recommand you to set the Ambiant Occlusion via your nvidia inspector panel and turn it off in the enbseries.ini (or use the enbseries.ini provided in the performance folder).  

[center][img]http://tof.canardpc.com/view/4a4ecc43-1985-4eeb-93c5-c5934500cb38.jpg[/img][/center]

[img]http://tof.canardpc.com/view/3ad9dfec-9580-4b4f-b7b1-2bfe4c65d3b6.jpg[/img]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27043]- Enhanced Lights and FX by anamorfus [/url]

Boris Vorontsov - for his ENB v0.119.
Midhras - author of Midhrastic ENB for Fallout 3, who inspired the most this ENB. 
LSiwora - author of the Wilds, some ENBseries.ini values.
Plutoman101 - realistic lighting esps.
HeliosDoubleSix - postprocessing assets in enbeffect.fx
Matso - DOF, Immersive Bloom, Anamorphic Flare.
Dirty Peasant - additions to enbeffect/enbbloom code.
Trillville - author of the palette, slightly modified by Midhras.
Andrej Dudenhefner et. al - SMAA injector.
author: Windofthenords
